FuncDef:
The isis peer hold-cost timer command sets the period during which IS-IS keeps the specified cost in local LSPs.
The undo isis peer hold-cost command restores the default setting. The isis peer hold-cost timer command sets the period during which IS-IS keeps the specified cost in local LSPs. The undo isis peer hold-cost command restores the default setting. By default, after a neighbor relationship is established, IS-IS does not retain the specified cost and hold time in local LSPs.
